title: Director, Finance
descriptionHtml:
At Adalvo, we're not just a company - we're a team of passionate people driven by our mission to consistently deliver high-quality products and services to our partners. We are positive, fast and are always on target, we are Adalvo! 🎯 🚀


We are looking for an enthusiastic Director, Finance to join our dynamic team. If you're someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and loves tackling new challenges, then this is the perfect opportunity for you.



SUMMARY OF POSITION

The Director Finance has overall responsibility for the finance function. The role combines operational and strategic roles and involves both management accounting and financial control functions.


RESPONSIBILITIES


Primary responsibilities of this role include the following:


  • Overseeing of all day-to-day and month-end activities;
  • Improving, monitoring and supervising of internal controls, processes and policies to mitigate and manage risks;
  • Preparing annual statutory Accounts and oversees the annual audit of all Adalvo entities;
  • Overseeing all tax and regulatory compliance issues;
  • Providing financial analysis and guidance to support business decisions and strategic planning;
  • Managing relationships with external stakeholders, such as auditors, banks, and tax authorities.
  • Developing and maintaining financial policies and procedures that ensure the integrity of financial reporting and compliance with all relevant regulations;
  • Driving financial process improvement initiatives to optimize financial performance and reduce costs
  • Training and developing the finance team, ensuring their professional development and performance. This includes setting performance expectations, providing ongoing feedback and coaching, conducting performance evaluations, and identifying training and development needs.
  • Managing the finance team, including recruitment, retention, and performance management.
  • Taking an active part in the strategic projects, such as implementing and improving of SAP, to ensure that the company's financial systems and processes are optimized to support the achievement of the company's strategic goals;
  • Assisting in the Annual Budgeting process;
  • Participating in Quality management review and contribute to the identification of opportunities for the continual improvement of processes and systems;
  • Follow relevant GDP &GMP required related to distribution and importation activities.


QUALIFICATIONS

  • Qualified accountant (ACCA, CPA);
  • At least 5 years of experience of direct leadership and/or cross functional team leadership;
  • Fully conversant and up to date with IFRS reporting standards and requirements;
  • Possess experience of working with global multi-national companies;
  • Strong IT skills, always being ahead of new technologies;
  • Ability to handle high levels of pressure and critical decision-making;
  • Exceptional communication skills at all levels;
  • High integrity and openness combined with commitment to good governance; and
  • Energetic, highly motivated, with an enquiring mind and passion for excellence and innovation in pursuit of business growth and success.


CORE COMPETENCIES


  • Business Focus
  • Drive for Results
  • Building Team Spirit
  • Customer Service
  • Embracing Change
  • Quality
  • Technical skills
  • Time management
  • Practical mindset



Why join us?


🎯 Exciting Challenges: Every day brings new opportunities to learn and grow.

🎯 Supportive Environment: We foster a culture of collaboration, where your ideas are valued, and your voice is heard.

🎯Career Development: We're committed to helping you reach your full potential through ongoing training and development opportunities.

🎯Recognizing Excellence: We recognize and appreciate hard work and dedication by offering competitive compensation packages and employee rewards programs that acknowledge contributions and achievements.

🎯Fun and Inclusive Culture: We believe in celebrating our successes and building strong connections within our team.


Ready to Ignite Your Passion?


If you're ready to take the next step in your career and join a business committed to consistently deliver high-quality products and services, then we want to hear from you! Send us your resume today!


Please be informed that only selected candidates will be contacted.
